title: INfinance
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: ‘He doesn’t seem to care’: My secretive father, 81, added my name to a bank account. What about my mom?
items.description: “Neither my mom nor I know anything about their finances.”

items.title: My brother stole $100K from my mom to buy bitcoin. Do I convince her to sue him?
This major legal decision will power the stock market — and turbocharge your 401(k)
items.description: U.S. Supreme Court ruling supports industry deregulation — and the stock market hasn’t yet priced this in.

items.title: Robinhood shares soar as new crypto stock tokens open doors to overseas investors
items.description: The stock tokens give E.U. investors exposure to hundreds of U.S. stocks, as well as to private companies SpaceX and OpenAI.

items.title: Goldman’s stock surges toward another record, as the ‘big winner’ of Fed’s stress tests
items.description: Bank stocks have outperformed the broad market with Goldman Sachs up 23% and JPMorgan Chase up 22% in the first half of 2025.

items.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
items.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

items.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek

items.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
items.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
